TopicTitle: Twenty Four "First Contract" Company Logos Revealed!

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/5f7358896794d45c23de707e6bf66af7/tumblr_inline_n85lgukJta1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Another six company logos to be seen in <em>Kerbal Space program: First Contract</em> have been revealed. This brings the current total to twenty four of them so far. Which one of them is your favorite? View them all <a href="http://bit.ly/1rkr6RL"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

I'm glad to see so many companies - hopefully it means a lot of variety between the missions.

Can't wait for the release!

I'm not sure I've seen it asked yet, can you confirm yet whether or not you can add or modify contract givers (the companies) including adding new logos for new companies and possibly modifying exsisting ones. Not that I'd want to modify the existing ones, they look great. The community did a great job. I just wish I knew about this. I would have submitted one. Oh well. Here's an example, I had a friend clean it up.

Edited July 4, 2014 by UAL002
